raw_body: PERERA – SURANGANI MENIQUE (nee WICKREMASINGHE) – Beloved mother of Anil (USA) and Tillak (Skyways Travel Solutions),​ mother-in-law of Ramona (USA) and Elorine,​ grandmother of Harshini (Aus),​ Arjun (USA) and Dimitri. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s from 10 a.m. from the 10th of October 2023. Funeral Service will be held on the 11th of October 2023 at 2 p.m. followed by Cremation at Borella Crematorium at 3 p.m.064654
